courses: At the undergraduate level, Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) degrees in disciplines such as Computer Science & Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Electronics & Communication Engineering. For postgraduate studies, Master of Technology (M.Tech) programs in fields like Computer Science & Engineering and Mechanical Engineering. Master of Science (M.Sc) degrees are offered in Mathematics and Physics. The university also provides Master of Architecture (M.Arch) and Master of Planning (M.Planning) programs. Master of Business Administration (MBA) and Master of Computer Applications (MCA) programs. Diploma and certificate courses are also available in various specializations.

University Name: Sri Guru Granth Sahib World University, Fatehgarh Sahib
courses:
Undergraduate programs include Bachelor of Science (B.Sc) in Medical Laboratory Technology and B.Sc (Hons.), Bachelor of Physiotherapy (BPT), Bachelor of Arts (BA), Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws (B.A.LL.B.), Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com Hons.), Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA), Bachelor of Law (LL.B), Bachelor of Physical Education (B.P.Ed), Bachelor of Management Studies (BMS), Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA), Bachelor of Physical Education and Sports (BPES), Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Education (BA + B.Ed), Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in various specializations, and integrated B.Tech + M.Tech programs.
Postgraduate programs include Master of Science (M.Sc) and M.Sc (Hons.), Master of Computer Applications (MCA), Master of Business Administration (MBA), Master of Commerce (M.Com), Master of Technology (M.Tech), Master of Arts (MA) in various disciplines, Master of Laws (LL.M), Master of Physical Education (M.P.Ed), and Master of Physiotherapy (MPT).
Diploma programs are offered in various fields, including Diploma in Engineering (Polytechnic) and others. Certificate courses, such as the Certificate Course in Sri Guru Granth Sahib, are also available. Additionally, the institution provides opportunities for advanced research through its Ph.D. programs in multiple disciplines.

University Name: Swami Vivekanand Institute of Engineering and Technology (SVIET), Mohali
courses:
Undergraduate programs include Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) with lateral entry options, Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm), Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) with lateral entry options, Bachelor of Science (B.Sc) with lateral entry options, Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA), Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com), Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws (B.A.LL.B.), Bachelor of Law (LL.B), Bachelor of Physiotherapy (BPT), Bachelor of Hotel Management and Catering Technology (BHMCT), and Pharm.D.
Diploma programs include Diploma in Pharmacy (D.Pharm), Diploma in Engineering (Polytechnic) with lateral entry options, and Industrial Training Institute (ITI) programs. Postgraduate programs include Master of Technology (M.Tech), Master of Computer Applications (MCA), Master of Science (M.Sc), Master of Business Administration (MBA), Master of Arts (MA), Master of Commerce (M.Com), and Master of Education (M.Ed).
The institution also offers a Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications (PGDCA) and research opportunities through Ph.D. programs in various disciplines.

University Name: Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology, Patiala
courses: Undergraduate programs include Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Biotechnology and Bachelor of Engineering (BE) with 15 different specializations, as well as lateral entry options for both B.Tech and BE. Postgraduate programs include Master of Technology (M.Tech) with 7 specializations, Master of Engineering (ME) with 14 options, Master of Science (M.Sc) in 6 fields, and Master of Arts (MA) in 3 areas. Additionally, the institution offers an extensive MBA program with 12 specializations. Ph.D. programs are available in 15 disciplines.
Achievements: Ranked among the top engineering institutes

University Name: University of Petroleum and Energy Studies (UPES), Dehradun
courses:
The School of Computer Science offers programs such as B.Tech., B.Sc., BCA, M.Tech., and MCA. The School of Business provides programs including BBA, B.Com. (Hons.), MBA, and integrated programs like BBA-MBA and B.Com. (Hons.)-MBA. The School of Law features courses such as BA LL.B (Hons.), BBA LL.B (Hons.), LL.B (Hons.), and LL.M.
The School of Design offers B.Des. and M.Des. programs. The School of Advanced Engineering provides B.Tech., B.Sc. (Hons.), M.Tech., and M.Sc. programs. The School of Liberal Studies & Media offers courses like B.Sc. (H), BA, BA (H), and MA. Lastly, the School of Health Sciences includes programs like B.Pharm, B.Sc., B.Tech., and M.Sc.
About: Leading university in energy and petroleum education
Affiliations: Global partnerships in energy and research
